courses.title: Cyber Security
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Learn how to protect digital infrastructure, networks, and data from cyber threats, hacking, and data breaches. This course covers ethical hacking, network security, and incident response.
features: Network security, firewalls, and risk management

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Master AI fundamentals including neural networks, natural language processing, deep learning, and real-world AI applications. Designed for future AI engineers.

courses.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Learn how to deploy, manage, and scale applications on the cloud using Amazon Web Services. Covers EC2, S3, RDS, IAM, and Lambda functions.

courses.title: Python with Machine Learning
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: A practical course to learn machine learning models using Python, covering regression, classification, clustering, and real datasets.

courses.title: Python with Django
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Develop full-stack web applications using Django – the most popular Python framework. Learn backend, APIs, templating, and ORM.
features: REST API with Django Rest Framework

courses.title: Python with Data Science
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Become a data expert by mastering Python for data analysis, visualization, and predictive modeling using real-life data.

courses.title: Training on AutoCAD
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Learn 2D and 3D CAD design using AutoCAD for architecture, civil, mechanical, and electrical design projects.

courses.title: Training on SolidWorks
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Learn mechanical design and 3D modeling using SolidWorks for product development and simulation.

courses.title: Industrial Automation & Systems
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of industrial automation, control systems, and sensors for manufacturing setups.

courses.title: PLC & SCADA
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: In-depth training on programmable logic controllers and SCADA systems used in industrial control processes.

courses.title: Internet of Things (IOT)
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Learn to build smart devices using sensors, microcontrollers, and cloud systems. Covers Arduino, ESP32, and IoT cloud platforms.

courses.title: PCB & Circuit Designing
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Design and prototype printed circuit boards (PCBs) using industry tools and standards for electronics projects.

courses.title: ASP .Net with MVC
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Learn to build enterprise web applications using ASP.NET MVC framework with C#. Covers routing, Razor views, and backend logic.

courses.title: JAVA with JSP & SERVER Pages
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Master Java for building server-side applications with JSP, Servlets, and JDBC connectivity.

courses.title: JAVA with Spring Framework
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Build modern Java applications using Spring Boot, REST APIs, and advanced features like dependency injection and JPA.

courses.title: Android Application Development
courses.subtitle: Certification
courses.description: Develop mobile apps from scratch using Android Studio, Java/Kotlin, and Firebase for backend support.
